candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (6 votes): openrouter_gemini: Another Bitcoin mining stock (like MARA), heavily influenced by crypto market cycles. Aligns with goldmine patterns of commodity/crypto exposure and volatility; meme-like retail hype during rallies supports rotation plays. Ideal for mean reversion as it trades below its 200-day moving average with increasing volume on dips.
